data.event: "Five patients cancelled surgery in January," says the Toronto facial plastic surgeon.
Today, cosmetic procedures are viewed as an investment in staying competitive in a cut-throat job market.

event.title: got tired of feeling and looking withered and weary, so in 2007

data.event: Bruno, owner of Decree in Colour salon, says she got tired of feeling and looking withered and weary, so in 2007 she opted for an injectable filler to add volume to her cheeks and Botox on her forehead.

event.title: look fresh, like you've been on a vacation for six weeks

data.event: People value looking good and Botox offers instant results with no downtime -- "you look fresh, like you've been on a vacation for six weeks," says the Edmonton cosmetic dermatologist, adding business is at 100% capacity.
